1"""MCP tools for UniFi Access operations.""" 

2 

3from typing import Any 

4 

5from unifi_mcp.clients.access_client import AccessClient 

6 

7 

8async def get_unifi_access_points(access_client: AccessClient) -> list[dict[str, Any]]: 

9 """Get all access points from the UniFi Access Controller.""" 

10 access_points = await access_client.get_access_points() 

11 return access_points 

12 

13 

14async def get_unifi_access_users(access_client: AccessClient) -> list[dict[str, Any]]: 

15 """Get all users from the UniFi Access Controller.""" 

16 users = await access_client.get_users() 

17 return users 

18 

19 

20async def get_unifi_access_logs(access_client: AccessClient) -> list[dict[str, Any]]: 

21 """Get door access logs from the UniFi Access Controller.""" 

22 logs = await access_client.get_door_access_logs() 

23 return logs 

24 

25 

26async def unlock_unifi_door( 

27 access_client: AccessClient, door_id: str 

28) -> dict[str, Any]: 

29 """Unlock a door via the UniFi Access Controller.""" 

30 result = await access_client.unlock_door(door_id) 

31 return result 

32 

33 

34async def set_unifi_access_schedule( 

35 access_client: AccessClient, user_id: str, schedule: dict[str, Any] 

36) -> dict[str, Any]: 

37 """Set access schedule for a user via the UniFi Access Controller.""" 

38 result = await access_client.set_access_schedule(user_id, schedule) 

39 return result
